room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Tewksbury in Boston
review: Ben and Chris were fantastic! Had a great time with our three boys going through the Antidote puzzle. Highly recommend this for families.

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Tewksbury in Boston
review: Awesome escape experience. My team took 3rd place for Antidote with only 1 hint, will be coming back for more challenges.

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Tewksbury in Boston
review: We went to the Tewksbury location as a work outing and it was so much fun. The staff there are very awesome and it was very clean. My team did the Antidote room and it was a lot of fun. We did not get out but want to go back and try again.
